OSS_SERVER_LIST.name: CircuitPython: NRF24L01
OSS_SERVER_LIST.description: CircuitPython driver library for the nRF24L01 transceiver.

OSS_SERVER_LIST.name: CircuitPython: LSM9DS1
OSS_SERVER_LIST.description: CircuitPython module for the LSM9DS1 accelerometer, magnetometer, and gyroscope.

OSS_SERVER_LIST.name: CircuitPython: MPU6050
OSS_SERVER_LIST.description: A port of the python library for the MPU6050. 6 Degrees of Freedom sensor to CircuitPython using the Adafruit_BusDevice library.

OSS_SERVER_LIST.name: Viking Robotics: Drivetrain
OSS_SERVER_LIST.description: This module contains the necessary algorithms for utilizing different DC motor types in different configurations.

OSS_SERVER_LIST.name: Viking Robotics: GPS_Serial
OSS_SERVER_LIST.description: Yet another NMEA sentence parser for serial UART based GPS modules, but this time using multi-threading

OSS_SERVER_LIST.name: Flask
OSS_SERVER_LIST.description: The Python micro framework for building web applications.

OSS_SERVER_LIST.name: Flask-CacheBuster
OSS_SERVER_LIST.description: Flask-CacheBuster is a lightweight Flask extension that adds a hash to the URL query parameters of each static file.

OSS_SERVER_LIST.name: Flask-Compress
OSS_SERVER_LIST.description: Compress responses in your Flask app with gzip.

OSS_CLIENT_LIST.name: Bulma
OSS_CLIENT_LIST.description: Modern CSS framework based on Flexbox.

OSS_CLIENT_LIST.name: Bulma Badge
OSS_CLIENT_LIST.description: Bulma extension element to display a number badge on text, button, etc.

OSS_CLIENT_LIST.name: Bulma Divider
OSS_CLIENT_LIST.description: Bulma extension to easily display an horizontal or vertical divider.

OSS_CLIENT_LIST.name: Bulma QuickView
OSS_CLIENT_LIST.description: Bulma extension to display a QuickView compoment.

OSS_CLIENT_LIST.name: Chart.js
OSS_CLIENT_LIST.description: Simple HTML5 Charts using the <canvas> tag.

OSS_CLIENT_LIST.name: outdated-browser-rework
OSS_CLIENT_LIST.description: Detects outdated browsers and advises users to upgrade to a new version. Handles mobile devices!
